summary: Implements a mock version of the AWS EventBridge Scheduler service for the Moto testing framework, including custom exception types, in‑memory data models for schedules and schedule groups with full CRUD and tagging capabilities, and an HTTP response layer that parses API requests and returns correctly formatted JSON responses.
business_intent: Allow developers to write and run unit or integration tests that interact with EventBridge Scheduler APIs without contacting real AWS services, ensuring fast, reliable, and cost‑free testing of scheduling functionality.
